name: MazeScape (JackhammerYT)
description:
ALL THE CLUES ARE LIE DONT TRUST THE GAME AT ALL DONT TRUST THE OLD GUY NEITHER SIGN BOARDS. LETS SEE IF U GET TO END.

W - Forward

A - left rotate

D - right rotate

Details about game:

terrain and skybox -: Terragen

3d models -: blender 

engine -: unity 3d

Audio -: bfxr and fl studios 

artwork 2d -: krita
